p: A total of 323/2326 (14%) articles reported on mitigation or prevention and control strategies for CHIKV, mainly focusing on vaccination against CHIKV (78/323; 24%), personal protective measures (79/323; 25%), the use of insecticides (156/323; 48%), public education (48/323; 15%), quarantine of infected individuals (5/323; 2%) and biological control of mosquitoes (51/323; 16%); Table 1.
